text: Since she has been in a relationship with Prince William for almost two decades, Kate Middleton has had plenty of time to get acquainted with the royal family. Between social events and family gatherings, we ’ ve seen the duchess interact with her in - laws many times. Yet mystery surrounds how much the family actually likes her. What is Kate ’ s relationship really like with the rest of the royal family? Let ’ s take a deeper look at her relationships, including a royal family tie that ’ s painfully tense ( No. 11 ). 1.
